medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient had a 4-day history of nausea/vomiting, right lower quadrant abdominal pain, and bloating/abdominal distension. Pain in right lower quadrant began at onset, improved slightly but has since been stable. Patient has anorexia and clear emesis. No bowel movement for 4 days.
medical_history.family_history: Father with prostate cancer, mother with breast cancer.
